
#----------------------------------------------------- MIPS CPU TEST CASES

# inputNames :
# op[5:0],  rs[4:0],  rt[4:0],  rd[4:0],  sh[4:0],  f[5:0],
# s[31:0],  t[31:0]

# outputNames :
# o[31:0]

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR ADD
# ADD		0000 00ss ssst tttt dddd d000 0010 0000

# 255 + 1 = 256
testCase 
{
000000 01000 01001 01010 00000 100000,
00000000 00000000 00000000 11111111,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001,
#
00000000 00000000 00000001 00000000
}

# 
testCase 
{
000000 01000 01001 01010 00000 100000,
00000000 11111111 01111111 11111100,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000100,
#
00000000 11111111 10000000 00000000
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR ADDU
# ADDU       0000 00ss ssst tttt dddd d000 0010 0001

# 253 + 1 = 254
testCase 
{
000000 01000 01001 01010 00000 100001,
00000000 00000000 00000000 11111101,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001,
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 11111110
}

# 
testCase 
{
000000 01000 01001 01010 00000 100001,
00000000 11111111 01111111 11111100,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000101,
#
00000000 11111111 10000000 00000001
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR ADDIU
# ADDI		0010 00ss ssst tttt iiii iiii iiii iiii

# 3 + (-1) = 2
testCase
{
001000 01000 01001 11111111 11111111,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000011,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000010
}

# 255 + 255 = 510
testCase
{
001000 01000 01001 00000000 11111111,
00000000 00000000 00000000 11111111,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
00000000 00000000 00000001 11111110
}

# -4 + 3 = -1
testCase 
{
001000 01000 01001 00000000 00000011,
11111111 11111111 11111111 11111100,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR AND
# AND 		0000 00ss ssst tttt dddd d000 0010 0100

testCase
{
000000 01000 01001 01100 00000 100100,
11111111 11111111 01010101 01010101,
00001111 00001111 11111111 11111111
#
00001111 00001111 01010101 01010101
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR ANDI
# ANDI 		0011 00ss ssst tttt iiii iiii iiii iiii

testCase 
{
001100 01000 01001 10101010 11111111,
11111111 00000000 11111111 11111100,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
00000000 00000000 10101010 11111100
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR OR
# OR 		0000 00ss ssst tttt dddd d000 0010 0101

testCase
{
000000 01000 01001 01100 00000 100101,
11110000 11110000 00000000 00001111,
00010000 00000011 11110000 00000000
#
11110000 11110011 11110000 00001111
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR ORI
# ORI		0011 01ss ssst tttt iiii iiii iiii iiii

testCase
{ 
001101 01000 01001 10101010 11111111,
11111111 00000000 00000110 00001111,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
11111111 00000000 10101110 11111111
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR SLT
# SLT 		0000 00ss ssst tttt dddd d000 0010 1010

# slt 8, 7
testCase
{
000000 01000 01001 01010 000 0010 1010
00000000 00000000 00000000 00001000
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000111
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
}

# slt -1, 10
testCase
{
000000 01000 01001 01110 000 0010 1010
11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111
00000000 00000000 00000000 00001010
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR SLTI
# SLTI 		0010 10ss ssst tttt iiii iiii iiii iiii

# slti 11 2
testCase
{
001010 00111 01000 00000000 00000010
00000000 00000000 00000000 00001011
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
}

# slti -1 5
testCase
}
001010 00111 01000 11111111 11111111
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000101
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR SRL
# SRL	0000 00-- ---t tttt dddd dhhh hh00 0010

testCase
{
000000 00000 01001 01100 10000 000010,
00000000 11111111 00000000 11111111,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 11111111
}

testCase
{
000000 00000 01001 01100 00011 000010,
00000000 00000000 11111111 10101010,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
00000000 00000000 00011111 11110101
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR SRA
# SRA	0000 00-- ---t tttt dddd dhhh hh00 0011

testCase
{
000000 00000 01001 01100 10000 000011,
00000000 11111111 00000000 11111111,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 11111111
}

testCase
{
000000 00000 01001 01100 00011 000011,
10000000 00000000 11111111 10101010,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000,
#
11110000 00000000 00011111 11110101
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR SRLV
# SRLV		0000 00ss ssst tttt dddd d000 0000 0110

testCase
{ 
000000 01000 01001 01100 00000 000110,
00000000 00000000 11111111 00000000
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000011
#
00000000 00000000 00011111 11100000
}

testCase
{
000000 01000 01001 01100 00000 000110,
11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111
00000000 00000000 00000000 00001100
#
00000000 00001111 11111111 11111111
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR SUB
# SUB 		0000 00ss ssst tttt dddd d000 0010 0010

# 255 - 31 = 224
testCase
{
000000 01000 01001 01010 00000 100010,
00000000 00000000 00000000 11111111,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00001111,
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 11110000
}

# 32767 - (-1) = 32768
testCase
{
000000 01000 01001 01010 00000 100010,
00000000 00000000 11111111 11111111,
11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111,
#
00000000 00000001 00000000 00000000
}

# x - x = 0
testCase
{
000000 01000 01001 01010 00000 100010,
01010101 01010101 01010101 01010101,
01010101 01010101 01010101 01010101
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR MULT
# MULT       0000 00ss ssst tttt 0000 0000 0001 1000

# 5 * 6 = 30
testCase
{
0000 00 00011 00111 0000 0000 0001 1000
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000101,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000110
#
00000000 00000000 00000000 00011110
}

testCase
{
0000 00 00101 00111 0000 0000 0001 1000
00000000 00000001 00000001 00000011,
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000111
#
00000000 00000111 00000111 00010101
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR XOR
# XOR       0000 00ss ssst tttt dddd d--- --10 0110

testCase
{
0000 00 00011 00010 00111 00000 10 0110
11111111 00000000 11110000 11001100,
11110000 11110000 11001100 10101010
#
00001111 11110000 00111100 01100110
}

#----------------------------------------------------- TEST CASES FOR XORI
# XORI       0011 10ss ssst tttt iiii iiii iiii iiii

testCase
{
0011 10 00011 00111 11110000 11110000
00000000 00000000 11111111 00000000
00000000 00000000 00001111 11110000
#
00000000 00000000 11110000 11110000
}
